articles.title: Review & setlist: At the Shubert, Robert Plant’s quest to keep evolving was on full display
articles.description:

summary: Robert Plant performed at the Shubert Theatre in Boston on November 7, 2025.

Local residents experienced a unique blend of musical styles from a legendary artist.

articles.title: Are AI hiring tools to blame for job seekers being ghosted? Experts say it’s more complicated.
articles.description:

summary: Job seekers in Boston report increased ghosting due to AI hiring tools.

Local candidates may face prolonged job searches as AI tools complicate recruitment.

articles.title: Bari Weiss was hired to remake CBS News. Here’s how it’s working out so far.

summary: Bari Weiss became CBS News editor in chief in October 2023, initiating significant changes.

articles.title: Local obituary: Bruce Higgins, 51, West Roxbury dad, prolific youth sports coach, and Boston cop
articles.description:

summary: Bruce Higgins, 51, passed away, leaving a legacy in West Roxbury youth sports.

His contributions significantly enhanced youth engagement and development in local athletics.

articles.title: Police: Uber driver strangled with wire, carjacked in Boston
articles.description:

summary: Boston police report an Uber driver was strangled and carjacked on November 7.
